content.text: I love listening to oldies while I'm working in the studio. Do you have any favorite songs?
I love listening to oldies while enjoying my ice cream. My favorite song is "Can't Help Falling in Love" by Elvis Presley.
That's a great song! I love Elvis.
Me too! I also love Agatha Christie novels.
I've never read any of her books. What's your favorite one?
My favorite is "Death on the Nile". It's a murder mystery set on a cruise ship.
That sounds interesting. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a great book.
What are some other things you like to do for fun?
I love driving in the country side. It's so peaceful and relaxing.
Me too! I love going for long drives on country roads.
My favorite flower is a lily. They're so beautiful and delicate.
Me too! I love the way they smell.
Me too! They're so sweet and refreshing.
I'm glad we have so much in common.
Me too! I think we're going to be good friends.
